definitions.definition: A journey made to a sacred place, or a religious journey.
examples: In the Muslim faith, the pilgrimage to Mecca is known as the Hajj.

definitions.definition: A visit to any site revered or associated with a meaningful event.
examples: Each year we made a pilgrimage to New York City to visit the pub where we all first met.

main_definition: A journey made to a sacred place, or a religious journey.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A visit to any site revered or associated with a meaningful event.
